'?' : location.search;if (window.history && window.history.replaceState) {var ogU = location.pathname + window._cf_chl_opt.cOgUQuery + window._cf_chl_opt.cOgUHash;history.replaceState(null, null,"\/wp-content\/plugins\/wp-reviews-plugin-for-google\/static\/img\/platform\/logo.svg?__cf_chl_rt_tk=ITpxAf4wdip_Ti6izsrP9tq5D3vY8xTAdN3wlDWHdN8-1768411716-1.0.1.1-wMsxYLdQbaWzFT2yGFl.45ADXlpiDY1NjnOYvnfqgdY"+ window._cf_chl_opt.cOgUHash);a.onload = function() {history.replaceState(null, null, ogU);}}document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(a);}());
